item.title: Active Directory Password Export Service Silent Install
item.description: Password Export Service allows you to export users and passwords from one active directory domain to another. All the guides I found show how to install it graphically. It took a bit but eventually I was able to install the service AND import the key created with ADMT all automatically. I used chef but any automation tool will work. It did require some hacking. You have to edit the password export service yourself via orca, instEd, etc… Something has to alter a datbase table, or else it will ALWAYS prompt and ask if you who you want to run the service as.
